attributes.action: ensure all the MP's standing down do not get public funded severence payments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If an mp doesn't stand again at a general election then they will be paid a sum of money in line with their service. If they stand down before an election then they dont.They should go before the election

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
